name: Monumental Failure
description: Monumental Failure is a historically (in)accurate physics-based monument construction simulator. The game empowers you to recreate some of the world's most impressive architectural feats using incredible, and hard-to-believe, construction techniques.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: SM3 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Playing in split-screen may require additional computing power.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: SM4 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Playing in split-screen may require additional computing power.
